LanguageData.star_Gespenst_Boss.tools.0.label: Tail
LanguageData.star_Gespenst_Boss.tools.1.label: front left leg
LanguageData.star_Gespenst_Boss.tools.2.label: front right leg
LanguageData.star_Gespenst_Boss.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.star_Gespenst_Boss.tools.4.label: head
LanguageData.star_Gespenst_Boss.label: Geschpenst Watcher
LanguageData.star_Gespenst_Boss.description: The Watcher of the Geschpenst, an unknown quadrupedal entity and animate scourge from beyond outer space. They don't know why or what their purpose is, they just invade various planetary systems and annihilate intelligent creatures.\n\nThe Geschfenst Watcher summons Reboots to inflict mental attacks with claws and sharp parts on their tails.
LanguageData.star_Reboot.label: reboot
LanguageData.star_Reboot.description: Reboots are miniature entities summoned by Geschpenst Watchers. It is small and inferior, but it has a self-destruct function that destroys buildings, so it continues to advance while breaking formations.
LanguageData.star_Reboot.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.star_executor.label: star executor
LanguageData.star_executor.description: An entity called the Executor of the Stars. Delivering psychic attacks, it uses unknown energies that penetrate the minds of creatures, either making them perceive each other as enemies, or shockingly causing chaos.
LanguageData.star_executor.tools.0.label: left tentacle
LanguageData.star_executor.tools.1.label: right tentacle
LanguageData.star_executor.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.star_Carnifex.label: star Carnifex
LanguageData.star_Carnifex.description: An entity that slaughters enemies with a sharp blade. It has the role of spraying a smoke screen attached to its body, covering its sight, and jumping towards enemies to purge them.
LanguageData.star_Carnifex.tools.0.label: left meteor blade
LanguageData.star_Carnifex.tools.1.label: right meteor blade
LanguageData.star_Carnifex.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.star_Monarch.label: star lord
LanguageData.star_Monarch.description: A star lord is a giant entity that summons astral predators. Summons predators to bind enemies or create mind waves to attack the minds of enemies.
LanguageData.star_Monarch.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Star_Prayer.label: Star Prayer
LanguageData.Star_Prayer.description: An object with a distorted shape. Creates an explosion of mental energy, shocking the opponent's mind.
LanguageData.Star_Prayer.tools.0.label: left tentacle
LanguageData.Star_Prayer.tools.1.label: right tentacle
LanguageData.Star_Prayer.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.star_blade.label: star blade
LanguageData.star_blade.description: An object in the shape of a mega spider. It will attack with numerous troops as a vanguard unit that attacks in the forefront while inflicting mental attacks with the blades attached to its tail.
LanguageData.star_blade.tools.0.label: Tail
LanguageData.star_blade.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.star_blade.tools.2.label: head claw
LanguageData.star_priest.label: star priest
LanguageData.star_priest.description: An entity in human form that uses mental weapons. Fires a weak but mental weapon to aid the Astral Force's advance.
LanguageData.star_priest.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.star_priest.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.star_priest.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.star_predator.label: star predator
LanguageData.star_predator.description: They are weak with predatory creatures that follow the star lord, but overwhelm the enemies with their numbers.
LanguageData.star_predator.tools.0.label: head
